text: Hmm all seems well on Wind Island

I am a highly decorated officer of the
law, skilled in many areas of criminology

There must be some way I can put all
this training to use
My my, can it be? Is someone actually in need of the police?
Wind Island Police Department, officer Carter at your service
Hello officer Carter, it's Abi.
You're not busy are you?
Er well I was in a middle of chasing robbers
But I've wrapped up that case. What can I do for you?
Something terrible has happened!
What is it? Petty theft? Reckless driving? Disorderly conduct?
No, it's Mr. Teddy, he's missing!
Fantastic!

What I mean is I mean
fantastic that you called

As an officer of the law,
I've trained for such an occasion as this
What do you think has happened to Mr. Teddy?
My instincts tell me this could be a possible kidnappingI
Don't you mean, bear-napping?
I stand corrected! Have no fear, officer Carter is on the case

Finally I can put my training to
proper use
And be the policeman Wind Island has always hoped for
Officer Carter here!

You say you saw someone
carrying mr. Teddy?
Excellent! Can you describe what they look like?
Long ears. Hm
A very shady-looking character indeed

Officer Carter here you saw someone with
mr. Teddy?
Short tail? Got it!
A wicked criminal to be sure!

Wind Island Police
Department! You seen Mr. Teddy as well?
The person has green eyes?
My word! Poor Mr. Teddy has been abducted by an absolute monster!

If you see this suspect, do not approach
him
Call me, officer Carter,  immediately!
Officer Carter here

What? You've seen the
suspect wearing a pink bow?
Are you sure about that? A bow? A pink bow?

Yes hello this is Carter officer ...  I
mean officer Carter
It's Abi, any news about Mr Teddy?
Abi, I'm sorry! I've let you down and I've tarnished the reputation of the Wind Island Police Department

I've got plenty of descriptions
of the suspect
But I wasn't able to draw an accurate sketch!
Really? What does the suspect look like?
Long ears, short tail, green eyes, and if you can believe it, a pink bow!
Oh my gosh!
Well what is it?
I'm the suspect!
You?
Yes, I was wearing Mr. Teddy on my back the whole time!
And I would never known if it weren't for you officer Carter
You're the bestest policeman ever!
Yes well,  thank you Abi, thank you very much!
Case closed
